thread.title: Apple, and Twitter among 22 tech companies opposing Cisa bill
thread.title_full: Apple, Google and Twitter among 22 tech companies opposing Cisa bill - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Apple, and Twitter among 22 tech companies opposing Cisa bill
text:
Many of the world’s top technology companies are against cybersecurity plans before US Senate on privacy grounds, according to a new poll
Twenty-two of the world’s top technology companies are firmly against the controversial Cybersecurity Information Sharing Act (Cisa) now on the floor of the Senate, according to a new ... »
